article_title: Conservatives Should Support Obamacare Repeal Reconciliation Bill

article_metadata.description: This week, the U.S. House of Representatives will consider H.R. 3762, the "Restoring Americans' Healthcare Freedom Reconciliation Act of 2015." This bill would gut the major provisions of Obamacare and essentially make it unworkable. It's a bill that conservative House Members should support. H.R. 3762 is a net spending cut, [...]
article_metadata.author: Ryan Ellis
